languages.text: "Глейто, рядом. Больше выродок не вынесет, а нам нужны ответы, а не его смерть".
"Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."
languages.original_text: "Глейто, рядом. Больше выродок не вынесет, а нам нужны ответы, а не его смерть".

traits.locale_text: "Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."
"Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."
"Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."
"Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."
"Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."
"Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."

languages.text: “格雷托，住手吧，这个人渣已经承受不住了。我们要撬出答案，不是处决犯人。”
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."

traits.locale_text: “格雷托，住手吧，这个人渣已经承受不住了。我们要撬出答案，不是处决犯人。”

languages.text: «Glaito, ven. El miserable no lo soportará más. Necesitamos respuestas, no una ejecución».
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."

traits.locale_text: «Glaito, ven. El miserable no lo soportará más. Necesitamos respuestas, no una ejecución».

languages.text: « Glaito, au pied. Ce mécréant est à bout. Nous attendons des réponses, et non pas une exécution. »
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."

traits.locale_text: « Glaito, au pied. Ce mécréant est à bout. Nous attendons des réponses, et non pas une exécution. »

languages.text: 「グライト、戻れ。この悪人はもうもたない。俺たちに必要なのは処刑ではなく、答えだ」
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."

traits.locale_text: 「グライト、戻れ。この悪人はもうもたない。俺たちに必要なのは処刑ではなく、答えだ」

languages.text: "Glaito, gel. Alçak daha fazla dayanamaz. İhtiyacımız olan infaz değil, cevaplar."
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito, gel. Alçak daha fazla dayanamaz. İhtiyacımız olan infaz değil, cevaplar."

languages.text: "Glaito, bei Fuß! Die Missgeburt kann nicht mehr ertragen. Wir brauchen Antworten, keine Hinrichtung."
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. The miscreant can't take any more. What we need is answers, not execution."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito, bei Fuß! Die Missgeburt kann nicht mehr ertragen. Wir brauchen Antworten, keine Hinrichtung."
